result.execSummary:
The defendant Matthew A Werth was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Matthew A Werth

defendant.name: Werth, Matthew A
defendant.address: 405 Main St Apt B, Fairwater, WI 53931

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: from Clerk to Defendant re: Warrant

9:54 am
No Appearance by Defendant.  Court orders Warrant.
Court adjourned at 9:55 am

11:38 a.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Jeffrey Haase.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin and County of Green Lake.  Statement by Atty Haase - agreement has been reached, defendant will plea to 2016TR397 and count 1 on 2016CM100.  DA concurs.  Defendant concurs.  

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST to 2016TR397.  Court finds the defendant Guilty and sentences the defendant to:

16TR397 

-Fine and costs totalling $937.50.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-DL revocation - 7 months 
-AODA

Dismiss 2016TR118.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1 on 2016CM100 and orders count 2 be dismissed and read-in.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Sentencing statement by Atty Haase.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

-Court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-DNA Sample.

Court adjourned at 11:45 a.m.

records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on August 23, 2016 at 11:30 am.

11:52 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Barb Privat present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - have an offer and is acceptable to the defendant.  Court sets for plea & sentencing on August 23, 2016 at 11:30 a.m.  Mandatory appearance.

Court adjourned at 11:53 a.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 5, 2016 at 11:00 am.

12:05 p.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - filed a discovery demand and waiting on reports.  Court sets for plea & senencing on July 5, 2016 at 11:00 a.m.  Traffic cases to track along.

Court adjourned at 12:06 p.m.
Status hearing on May 24, 2016 at 11:00 am.
Status hearing on May 24, 2016 at 09:15 am.

8:51 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his/her right to an attorney.  Defendant enters a plea of NOT GUILTY.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond.  Court will set for Status Hearing on May 24, 2016 at 9:15 a.m.

Court enters NOT GUILTY pleas to the TR citations.

Court adjourned at 8:54 a.m.
